name: Overcome the Death of a Loved One
name_original: Overcome the Death of a Loved One
description:
Synopsis:

You are in the highest part of an unknown tower, beyond the sky, accompanied by Michi... What could happen?...

Gameplay Instructions Keyboard/Mouse:

W/A/S/D - Walk
Space bar - Interaction
Mouse - Camera rotation and Camera zoom
Esc - Close the game.

Purpose: Participate in the epic mega jam 2019.

Sound Effects: from Soundly.

Effects button start: https://opengameart.org/content/ice-shine-bells

Music CCO and CC3: 

Varon Kein - MC Happy Ending: https://opengameart.org/content/mc-happy-ending

Kistol - Sadness: https://opengameart.org/content/sadness

Monplaisir Loyalty Freak Music - Something to save: https://opengameart.org/content/something-to-save

meowman - Model Mesh 3d cat: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/cat-428dd300a0a94092945b2560719518c0
